title: Christoforos Charalambous
text:
Christoforos Charalambous (born 9 July 1992; ) is a <a href="Cyprus">Cypriot</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Enosis%20Neon%20THOI%20Lakatamia">Enosis Neon THOI Lakatamia</a>.
Career.
He started his career with <a href="AC%20Omonia">AC Omonia</a>, making his first appearance for the senior squad during the 2010–11 season.
He has played at international level for Cyprus U21.
Honours.
<a href="AC%20Omonia">AC Omonia</a>
